mapper.select: select row_number() over (order by a.create_date) RNUM, a.task_id, a.task_name, b.department, a.task_type, a.issue, c.name, a.status, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.create_date, a.description, a.comment1, a.table_name, a.expected_end_date from tem_d_adm.tb_iersf00 a , (select task_type, listagg(department,', ') within group (order by department) as department from tem_d_adm.TB_IERS_TASK_TYPES group by task_type) b, (select aa.task_type, listagg(aa.name,', ') within group (order by aa.name) as name from(select a.task_type, b.name from tem_d_adm.tb_iers_types_assignee a , tem_d_adm.tb_iers_users b where a.code = b.code group by a.code, b.name,a.task_type) aa group by aa.task_type) c where a.task_type = b.task_type and a.task_type = c.task_type and status ='Terminated'
select count(*) as total_count from tem_d_adm.tb_iersf00 where status ='Terminated'
